CountryProperties.description: A country object, based on official ISO 3166

ISO2.description: The canonical ISO2 (alpha-2) country code e.g AU

ISO3.description: The canonical ISO2 (alpha-2) country code e.g AU

CountryCode.description: The canonical CountryCode (country-code) country code e.g 036

Name.description: The canonical (official) 'Name' of the country e.g Australia

AltName.description: An alternate name for the country

RegionCode.description: The canonical RegionCode (region-code) for the country code e.g 009

RegionName.description: The canonical RegionName (region) for the country code e.g Oceania

SubRegionCode.description: The canonical SubRegionCode (sub-region-code) for the country code e.g 053

SubRegionName.description: The canonical Sub Region Name (sub-region) for the country code e.g Australia and New Zealand

IntermediateRegionCode.description: The canonical Intermediate Region Code (intermediate-region-code) for the country code

IntermediateRegionName.description: The canonical Intermediate Region Name (intermediate-region) for the country code

Coordinates.description: The canonical Coordinates of the country (canonical from google)

PrimaryLanguage.description: The canonical Primary Language of the country

Currency.description: The canonical Currency Code of the country (canonical from google)

IsEuropeanCountry.description: Is this country an european one? e.g Y

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
